doc.name: SequenceAttribute
doc.description: The sequence number for actor in the sequence domain. This parameter stores an integer value that is required to be unique within the portion of the model under the control of a single SequenceDirector. Duplicate sequence numbers will trigger an exception. FIXME: Shouldn't these numbers be forced to be unique, like by their position in the XML file?
doc.author: Elizabeth Latronico (Bosch)
